content:
Sure, here's an example:

Pre headline: Wake Up Excited Every Day!

Headline: Sculpt Your Ideal Life One Day at a Time with Day Sculpting

Subheadline: The Ultimate Daily Ritual for Achieving Your Dreams

Text above CTA button: Start Today and Transform Your Life

Text on CTA button: Get Started Now

Background image: A person standing on top of a mountain at sunrise, with an opacity of 70%

Image next to copy: An image of a person meditating, with the copy on the right side of the image

Image with copy: An image of a person achieving a goal, with the copy on the left side of the image.
